title: Scrape data from a web page

twitterSeachURLs.title: Twitter Mentions Search URL
twitterSeachURLs.description: URL to the mentions you want to monitor

maxTweets.title: Max Tweets Per URL
maxTweets.description: Set the maximum number of tweets to scrape per URL.

slackChannel.title: Slack channel name
slackChannel.description: Provide the name of the channel you want your message to be sent to. (e.g., competitor-monitoring)

slackBotToken.title: Slack Bot Token
slackBotToken.description: Provide your Slack App's Bot User OAuth Token (find it under your App's OAuth & Permissions tab)

slackSignInSecret.title: Slack Signin Secret
slackSignInSecret.description: Provide your Slack App's Signin Secret (in your App's page, go to Basic information -> App Credentials)
